3,2.description: A basic steel sword lying in the center of the room, usable for close combat.

grass_floor.description_from_texture: Lush green grass covering the floor, short blades with a slightly worn look and occasional tiny patches of earth showing through.
grass_floor.description_from_vector_store: This can be a field of small stones, a rough dirt path, a bloodstained ground, a texture for a dark cave floor, a damaged stone wall

wooden_wall.description_from_texture: Rough pine wooden planks forming the surrounding walls, visible grain, faint brown stains and light weathering at the edges.
wooden_wall.description_from_vector_store: This can be a section of wooden wall, a narrow hallway segment, a closed wooden gate, a simple wooden door, a brown UI panel

sword_item.description_from_texture: Shiny steel blade of a medieval sword with a polished finish, hilt wrapped in dark leather and a small brass pommel.
sword_item.description_from_vector_store: This can be a long, ornate sword, a magical blade, a ceremonial dagger, a stylized key, a weapon UI element

orc_skin.description_from_texture: Rough, greenish‑gray orc skin with subtle scar textures and a matte, slightly oily appearance.
orc_skin.description_from_vector_store: This can be a field of small stones, a rough dirt path, a bloodstained ground, a texture for a dark cave floor, a damaged stone wall

orc_armor.description_from_texture: Dull iron armor plates covering the orcs, pitted with rust spots and worn edges.
orc_armor.description_from_vector_store: This can be a stone floor, a rough wall, a patch of dirt, a dark metal plate, a texture for shadows

player_sprite.description_from_texture: Heroic adventurer sprite wearing worn brown leather armor, a bright red cloak, and a simple steel sword at the side.
player_sprite.description_from_vector_store: This can be a dwarven warrior, a stone golem, a heavily armored guard, a blacksmith NPC, a player character icon
